articles.title: The rise of Liverpool's Curtis Jones - From Gerrard's gem to Klopp's king - Goal India
articles.description: Wilfred Ndidi keeps reminding observers of his unrivalled quality and he’ll look to thrive yet again as Leicester City attempt to cross another hurdle at Aston Villa on Sunday.
